name: CervicalCytology_HD_Grouping
title: Cervical Cytology_HD_Grouping
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for High Risk HPV Test.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need with Cervical Cytology and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Data Element Scope: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need with Cervical Cytology and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need with Cervical Cytology and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need with Cervical Cytology and utilization in patients/users connected health.)
